覉字的基本解释

覉
jī
古同“羁”。

覉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jī］
［《廣韻》居宜切，平支，見。］
亦作“羇1”。亦作“覉1”。亦作“覊1”。“羁1”的繁体字。
(1)马络头。
(2)套上笼头。
(3)束缚，拘束。
(4)拘系。
(5)引申为拘禁。
(6)萦扰；被牵制。
(7)引申指拖延。
(8)寄居在外。亦指旅居的人。
(9)古代女孩的发髻。
(10)姓。汉有羁栩，见《姓苑》。

覉字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【襾字部】　覉； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1129第14
【篇海】羈本字。俗作覉、覊。

覉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
覉字的起名意思

暂无。

Succumb
Basic explanation of words
Succumb
jī
Gu Tong "Ji".
Succumb
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jī］
["Guangyun" is suitable for cutting, flat support, see. ]
Also known as "Yi 1". Also known as "覉1". Also known as "Ji 1". Traditional characters for "經1".
(1) Ma Luotou.
(2) Put on the halter.
(3) Restraint and restraint.
(4) Detention system.
(5) The extension is detention.
(6) Obsessive; be restrained.
(7) The extension refers to delay.
(8) Sojourn away. Also refers to people who live in.
(9) The bun of ancient girls.
(10) Last name. There is Ji Xu in the Han Dynasty, see "Xing Yuan".
Succumb
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of 襾字]　覉; Kangxi strokes: 23; Page number: page 1129-14
【Panhai】Ji this word. Vulgar as a sanctuary, restraint.
